Resources

Standards & Guidelines

  • WCAG 2.2 Quick Reference - Official success criteria and techniques
  • Accessible Design Principles - Key concepts from W3C
  • Bitcoin Design Guide - Community resource for Bitcoin UX

Assistive Technologies to Be Aware Of

Screen Readers

  • NVDA (Windows) - Free screen reader for Windows
  • VoiceOver - Built into macOS and iOS
  • JAWS - Professional screen reader for Windows

Other Assistive Tech

  • Screen Magnifiers: ZoomText, browser zoom tools
  • Speech Input: Dragon NaturallySpeaking, native voice control on mobile
  • Alternative Input Devices: Switch controls, eye tracking, keyboard-only setups

Testing Tools

  • axe DevTools - In-browser accessibility scanner
  • WAVE - WebAIM’s accessibility evaluation tool
  • Lighthouse - Google Chrome DevTools audit
  • Accessibility Insights - Microsoft’s suite for web and Windows apps

Bitcoin-Specific Resources

  • Open Bitcoin Design Community
  • Bitcoin UI Kit
  • Bitcoin Wallet Interaction Model

Recommended Reading

  • “Universal Design for Web Applications” by Wendy Chisholm & Matt May
  • “Inclusive Design Patterns” by Heydon Pickering
  • “Design for Real Life” by Eric Meyer & Sara Wachter-Boettcher

Communities

  • Bitcoin Design Community
  • A11Y Project
  • Inclusive Design 24

Contact

If you’d like to contribute to this guide or have questions about implementing these principles, please open an issue or contact us at your-email@example.com.
